TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN BARRICK <ABX> UNIT COMPLETES ISSUE
TEXT.BODY: <American Barrick Resources Corp> said wholly owned Barrick Resources (USA) Inc completed the previously announced 50 mln U.S. dlr issue of two pct gold indexed notes, which are guaranteed by American Barrick. Reuter
